item.title: VueJs 2 – 07 more about Vue components
item.dc:creator: Prasad Kavinda
item.description:
Reading Time: 5 minutes ‡∑Ñ‡∑ê‡∂∏‡∑ù‡∂ß‡∂∏ ‡∂Ü‡∂∫‡∑î‡∂∂‡∑ù‡∑Ä‡∂±‡∑ä, ‡∂∏‡∑ö VueJs ‡∂ú‡∑ê‡∂± ‡∂Ω‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂± 7 ‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑í post ‡∂ë‡∂ö.¬†‡∂Ö‡∂Ø post ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑î‡∂≠‡∑ä ‡∂∏‡∂∏ vue components ‡∂ú‡∑ê‡∂±‡∂∏ ‡∂≠‡∂∏‡∂∫‡∑í ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂∫‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ô. ‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∑Å‡∑ö‡∑Ç‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä, vue component ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂¥‡∑ä‚Äç‡∂ª‡∑è‡∂∫‡∑ù‡∂ú‡∑í‡∂ö‡∑Ä ‡∂ö‡∑ú‡∑Ñ‡∑ú‡∂∏‡∂Ø ‡∂∑‡∑è‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂≠‡∑è ‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ô ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂Ω ‡∑É‡∑Ñ props ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ô ‡∂∏‡∑ú‡∂±‡∑Ä‡∂Ø ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂Ω.¬†‡∂ö‡∂Ω‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä posts ‡∂∂‡∑ê‡∂Ω‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∑ô ‡∂±‡∑ê‡∂≠‡∑ä‡∂≠‡∂∏‡∑ä ‡∂∏‡∑ô‡∂≠‡∂±‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂ú‡∑í‡∑Ñ‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂∂‡∂Ω‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±. ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í ‡∂Ö‡∂Ø ‡∂¥‡∑ú‡∂©‡∑í app ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∑Ñ‡∂Ø‡∂∏‡∑î. ‡∑Ñ‡∑í‡∂≠‡∂∏‡∑î‡∂ö‡∑ú ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í ‡∑Ñ‡∂Ø‡∂±‡∑Ä ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂Ω, ‡∂∏‡∑ö Read more…

The post VueJs 2 – 07 more about Vue components appeared first on The SIGMA.
item.content:encoded:
Reading Time: 5 minutes

‡∑Ñ‡∑ê‡∂∏‡∑ù‡∂ß‡∂∏ ‡∂Ü‡∂∫‡∑î‡∂∂‡∑ù‡∑Ä‡∂±‡∑ä, ‡∂∏‡∑ö VueJs ‡∂ú‡∑ê‡∂± ‡∂Ω‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂± 7 ‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑í post ‡∂ë‡∂ö.¬†‡∂Ö‡∂Ø post ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑î‡∂≠‡∑ä ‡∂∏‡∂∏ vue components ‡∂ú‡∑ê‡∂±‡∂∏ ‡∂≠‡∂∏‡∂∫‡∑í ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂∫‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ô. ‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∑Å‡∑ö‡∑Ç‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä, vue component ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂¥‡∑ä‚Äç‡∂ª‡∑è‡∂∫‡∑ù‡∂ú‡∑í‡∂ö‡∑Ä ‡∂ö‡∑ú‡∑Ñ‡∑ú‡∂∏‡∂Ø ‡∂∑‡∑è‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂≠‡∑è ‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ô ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂Ω ‡∑É‡∑Ñ props ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ô ‡∂∏‡∑ú‡∂±‡∑Ä‡∂Ø ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂Ω.¬†‡∂ö‡∂Ω‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä posts ‡∂∂‡∑ê‡∂Ω‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∑ô ‡∂±‡∑ê‡∂≠‡∑ä‡∂≠‡∂∏‡∑ä ‡∂∏‡∑ô‡∂≠‡∂±‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂ú‡∑í‡∑Ñ‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂∂‡∂Ω‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±.

‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í ‡∂Ö‡∂Ø ‡∂¥‡∑ú‡∂©‡∑í app ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∑Ñ‡∂Ø‡∂∏‡∑î. ‡∑Ñ‡∑í‡∂≠‡∂∏‡∑î‡∂ö‡∑ú ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í ‡∑Ñ‡∂Ø‡∂±‡∑Ä ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂Ω, ‡∂∏‡∑ö ‡∑Ä‡∂ú‡∑ö ‡∂¥‡∑ú‡∂©‡∑í ‡∂¥‡∑ú‡∂©‡∑í messages display ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂¥‡∑î‡∑Ö‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∂±‡∑ä blog ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä.

‡∂ú‡∑ú‡∂©‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂Ö‡∂∫ bootstrap ‡∂ú‡∑ê‡∂± ‡∂Ø‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂±‡∑í‡∑É‡∑è, ‡∂∏‡∂∏ ‡∂∏‡∑ö‡∂ö style ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± bootstrap ‡∂¥‡∑è‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂†‡∑ä‡∂†‡∑í ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑Ä. ‡∂í¬†‡∂±‡∑í‡∑É‡∑è bootstrap CDN ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂≠‡∑ä index.html ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ö include ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂ï‡∂±‡∑ô. Blog ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ö¬†messages display ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± bootstrap ‡∑Ä‡∂Ω ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂± ‡∂∏‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂∏‡∑ö card ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂± component ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∂∑‡∑è‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂≠‡∑è ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑Ä. ‡∂í‡∂ö‡∂ß ‡∂Ö‡∂Ø‡∑è‡∂Ω template ‡∂ë‡∂ö getbootstrap.com ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂ú‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂¥‡∑î‡∑Ö‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∂±‡∑ä.

<div class="card text-white bg-primary mb-3">
  <div class="card-header">Header</div>
  <div class="card-body">
    <h5 class="card-title">Primary card title</h5>
    <p class="card-text">Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content.</p>
  </div>
</div>

‡∑Ñ‡∑ê‡∂∏ message ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä‡∂∏ display ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ô ‡∂∏‡∑ö card ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂± component ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∂∑‡∑è‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂≠‡∑è ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂Ω ‡∂±‡∑í‡∑É‡∑è, ‡∂í‡∂ö Vue component ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂Ø‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂ß ‡∑Ñ‡∂Ø‡∑è ‡∂ú‡∂≠‡∑ä‡∂≠‡∂∏ ‡∂±‡∑ê‡∑Ä‡∂≠ ‡∂±‡∑ê‡∑Ä‡∂≠ ‡∂∑‡∑è‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂≠‡∑è ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂¥‡∑î‡∑Ö‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∂±‡∑ä. ‡∂í‡∂ö ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ô ‡∂ö‡∑ú‡∑Ñ‡∑ú‡∂∏‡∂Ø ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂Ω ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í ‡∂∂‡∂Ω‡∂∏‡∑î.

‡∑Ñ‡∂ª‡∑í, ‡∂∏‡∑ö component ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ö ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ô, blog ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ö ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂± message ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂±‡∑í‡∑É‡∑è ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í ‡∂∏‡∑ö‡∂ö‡∂ß blog-message ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂Ω ‡∂±‡∂∏ ‡∂Ø‡∑è‡∂∏‡∑î. ‡∂ä‡∑Ö‡∂ú‡∂ß ‡∂∏‡∑ö‡∂ö‡∂ß ‡∂Ö‡∂Ø‡∑è‡∂Ω template ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∂∏‡∑ö ‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂Ø‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂ß set ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂¥‡∑î‡∑Ö‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∂±‡∑ä.

Vue.component('blog-message', {
    template: `
        <div class="card bg-light mb-3">
            <div class="card-header">Header</div>
            <div class="card-body">
                <p class="card-text">Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content.</p>
            </div>
        </div>
    `,
});

‡∂∏‡∑ô‡∑Ñ‡∑ô‡∂∏ ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∂‡∑î‡∂±‡∂ß ‡∂∏‡∑ö component ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∑Ä‡∑ê‡∂©‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂ú‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂Ö‡∂∏‡∑è‡∂ª‡∑î‡∂∫‡∑í. ‡∂∏‡∑ú‡∂ö‡∂Ø ‡∂∏‡∑ö component ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ö ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂± message ‡∂ë‡∂ö hard code ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂Ω‡∂±‡∑ô ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ô. ‡∂â‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂Ç ‡∂∏‡∑ö component ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∑Ñ‡∑í‡∂¥ ‡∑Ä‡∂≠‡∑è‡∑Ä‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂∑‡∑è‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂≠‡∑è ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∑ú‡∂≠‡∑ä ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂∏ message ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∂≠‡∂∏‡∂∫‡∑í ‡∂¥‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ô. ‡∂í ‡∂±‡∑í‡∑É‡∑è ‡∂∏‡∑ö component ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ö ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂± contents ‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑É‡∑ä ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂ª‡∑ì‡∂∏‡∑ö ‡∑Ñ‡∑ê‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑è‡∑Ä ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂ï‡∂±‡∑ô, ‡∂í ‡∑Ä‡∂ú‡∑ö‡∂∏ ‡∂∏‡∑ö‡∂ö‡∑ô ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∂ë‡∂ö instance ‡∑Ä‡∂Ω, ‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑É‡∑ä ‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑É‡∑ä message display ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂ª‡∑ì‡∂∏‡∑ö ‡∑Ñ‡∑ê‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑è‡∑Ä ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂ï‡∂±‡∑ô. ‡∂í‡∂ö ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂¥‡∑î‡∑Ö‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∂±‡∑ä props ‡∑Ñ‡∑è‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂≠‡∑è ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂Ω.

props

Props ‡∑Ä‡∂Ω‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ô, ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í ‡∑Ñ‡∂Ø‡∂¥‡∑î component ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ß, ‡∂¥‡∑í‡∂ß‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂∏‡∑ú‡∂±‡∑Ä‡∑Ñ‡∂ª‡∑í data pass ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂â‡∂© ‡∂Ø‡∑ô‡∂± ‡∂ë‡∂ö. ‡∂í‡∑Ä(Props) ‡∑Ñ‡∂ª‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂ß, ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í ‡∑Ñ‡∂Ø‡∂¥‡∑î custom element ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ö ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂± custom attributes ‡∑Ä‡∂ú‡∑ö. ‚Å£‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑ö component ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ö, title ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∑É‡∑Ñ body ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑É‡∑ä ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂ª‡∑ì‡∂∏‡∑ö ‡∑Ñ‡∑ê‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑è‡∑Ä ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂ï‡∂±‡∑ô. ‡∂í ‡∑Ä‡∂ú‡∑ö‡∂∏ ‡∂í data, ‡∂¥‡∑í‡∂ß‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂Ω‡∂∂‡∑è‡∂ú‡∑ê‡∂±‡∑ì‡∂∏‡∑ö ‡∑Ñ‡∑ê‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑è‡∑Ä ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂ï‡∂±‡∑ô. ‡∂í ‡∂±‡∑í‡∑É‡∑è ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í title ‡∑É‡∑Ñ body ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂Ω props 2‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂∏‡∂ú‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂í data, ‡∂∏‡∑ö component ‡∂ë‚Å£‡∂ö‡∂ß pass ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂∏‡∑î. ‡∂í‡∂ö ‡∂∏‡∑ö ‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂Ø‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂ß ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂¥‡∑î‡∂Ω‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∂±‡∑ä.

<div id="my-app">
    <div class="container" style="margin-top: 10px">
        <blog-message title="First post" body="the body of the first post"></blog-message>
        <blog-message title="Second post" body="The body of the second post"></blog-message>
        <blog-message title="Third post" body="The body of the third post"></blog-message>
    </div>
</div>

‡∂∏‡∑ö ‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂Ø‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂ß props ‡∑Ñ‡∂ª‡∑Ñ‡∑è pass ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂¥‡∑î data, component ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∂á‡∂≠‡∑î‡∂Ω‡∑ô‡∂Ø‡∑í ‡∑É‡∑è‡∂∏‡∑è‡∂±‡∑ä‚Äç‡∂∫ data ‡∑Ä‡∂ú‡∑ö‡∂∏ ‡∂¥‡∑è‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂†‡∑ä‡∂†‡∑í ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂¥‡∑î‡∑Ö‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∂±‡∑ä. ‡∑Ñ‡∑ê‡∂∂‡∑ê‡∂∫‡∑í ‡∂∏‡∑ö ‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂Ø‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂ß props ‡∑Ñ‡∂ª‡∑Ñ‡∑è pass ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂¥‡∑î data, component ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∂á‡∂≠‡∑î‡∂Ω‡∑ô‡∂Ø‡∑í ‡∂∑‡∑è‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂≠‡∑è ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂±‡∂∏‡∑ä, component ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∂á‡∂≠‡∑î‡∂Ω‡∑ô ‡∂∑‡∑è‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂≠‡∑è ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂± props ‡∂∏‡∑ú‡∂±‡∑Ä‡∂Ø ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂Ω, component ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ö define ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂Ω ‡∂≠‡∑í‚Å£‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂ï‡∂±‡∑ô. ‡∂¥‡∑Ñ‡∂Ω ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂± code ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∂∂‡∂Ω‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∂ö‡∑ú. ‡∂í‡∂ö‡∑ô component ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∂á‡∂≠‡∑î‡∂Ω‡∑ô props ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂± property ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂∏‡∂∏ ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂Ω ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ô ‡∂í‡∂ö. (‡∂ë‡∑ä‡∂ö‡∑ô ‡∂≠‡∑ö‡∂ª‡∑î‡∂∏ ‡∂≠‡∂∏‡∂∫‡∑í, ‡∂∏‡∑ö component ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ß title ‡∑É‡∑Ñ body ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂Ω props 2‡∂ö‡∑ä pass ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂¥‡∑î‡∑Ö‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂± ‡∂ë‡∂ö.) ‡∂Ø‡∑ê‡∂±‡∑ä title ‡∑É‡∑Ñ body ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂± ‡∂Ø‡∑ô‡∂ö, ‡∑É‡∂∏‡∑è‡∂±‡∑ä‚Äç‡∂∫ data 2‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∑Ä‡∂ú‡∑ö‡∂∏ ‡∂∑‡∑è‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂≠‡∑è ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂¥‡∑î‡∑Ö‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∂±‡∑ä.

Vue.component('blog-message', {
    props: ['title', 'body'],
    template: `
        <div class="card bg-light mb-3">
            <div class="card-header">{{ title }}</div>
            <div class="card-body">
                <p class="card-text">{{ body }}</p>
            </div>
        </div>
    `,
});

‡∂∏‡∑ö‡∂ö run ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∑è‡∂∏ ‡∂¥‡∑Ñ‡∂Ω image ‡∂í‡∂ö‡∑ö ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂± ‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂Ø‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô output ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂ë‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂ï‡∂±‡∑ô.

‡∂Ø‡∑ê‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í‡∂ß ‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂Ø messages ‚Å£display ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂¥‡∑î‡∑Ö‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∂±‡∑ä component ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑Ä.

page ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ö¬†display ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂± ‡∂î‡∂ö‡∑ä‡∂ö‡∑ú‡∂∏ messages ‡∂ß‡∑í‡∂ö main Vue instance ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ö store ‡∂ö‡∂ª ‡∂ú‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂¥‡∑î‡∑Ö‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∂±‡∑ä. ‡∂Ø‡∑ê‡∂±‡∂ß ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í ‡∂∏‡∑ö data, hard code ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂Ω ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂∏‡∑î. ‡∂ä‡∑Ö‡∂ú post ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∂∏‡∑ä back-end ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂∏‡∑ö‡∑Ä ‡∂Ö‡∂ª‡∂ú‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂Ø‡∑í‡∂∫. ‡∂∏‡∑ö ‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂Ø‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂ß messages ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂Ω object ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö ‡∂≠‡∂∏‡∂∫‡∑í ‡∂í‡∂ö ‡∂∏‡∂∏ store ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ô.

const app = new Vue({
    el: '#my-app',
    data: {
        messages:{
            {title: 'First post', body: 'The body of the first post'},
            {title: 'Second post', body: 'The body of the second post'},
            {title: 'Third post', body: 'The body of the third post'},
        }
    }
});

‡∂Ø‡∑ê‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂∏‡∑ô‡∑Ñ‡∑ô‡∂∏¬†store ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂¥‡∑î¬†messages ‡∂ß‡∑í‡∂ö, v-for ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∂∑‡∑è‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂≠‡∑è ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂Ω, ‡∂ë‡∂ö¬†message ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ß ‡∂ë‡∂ö¬†component ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∂ú‡∑è‡∂±‡∑ô¬†output ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂¥‡∑î‡∑Ö‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∂±‡∑ä. ‡∂í ‡∑Ä‡∂ú‡∑ö‡∂∏ v-bind ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂¥‡∑î‡∑Ö‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂í ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∂ë‡∂ö instance ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ß ‡∂Ö‡∂Ø‡∑è‡∂Ω title ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∑É‡∑Ñ body ‡∂ë‡∂ö bind ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±. ‡∂∏‡∑ö ‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂Ø‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂ß.

Vue.component('blog-message', {
    props: ['title', 'body'],
    template: `
        <div class="card bg-light mb-3">
            <div class="card-header">{{ title }}</div>
            <div class="card-body">
                <p class="card-text">{{ body }}</p>
            </div>
        </div>
    `
});

const app = new Vue({
    el: '#my-app',
    data: {
        messages:{
            {title: 'First post', body: 'The body of the first post'},
            {title: 'Second post', body: 'The body of the second post'},
            {title: 'Third post', body: 'The body of the third post'},
        }
    },
});
<div id="my-app">
    <div class="container" style="margin-top:10px">
        <blog-message v-for="message in messages" v-bind:title="message.title" v-bind:message="message.body"/>
    </div>
</div>

add new message

‡∂Ø‡∑ê‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í ‡∂∏‡∑ö‡∂ö‡∑ô messages¬†display ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂± ‡∂ö‡∑ú‡∂ß‡∑É ‡∑Ñ‡∂Ø‡∂Ω ‡∂â‡∑Ä‡∂ª‡∂∫‡∑í. ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í ‡∂ö‡∑ú‡∑Ñ‡∑ú‡∂∏‡∂Ø ‡∂Ö‡∂Ω‡∑î‡∂≠‡∑ä¬†message ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂∏‡∑ö‡∂ö‡∂ß add ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ô. ‡∂Ø‡∑ê‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í ‡∂∂‡∂Ω‡∂∏‡∑î ‡∂í‡∂ö ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ô ‡∂ö‡∑ú‡∑Ñ‡∑ú‡∂∏‡∂Ø ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂Ω.

‡∂â‡∑É‡∑ä‡∑É‡∑ô‡∂Ω‡∑ä‡∂Ω‡∂∏ ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í ‡∑Ñ‡∂Ø‡∑è ‡∂ú‡∂∏‡∑î message ‡∂ë‡∂ö type ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂Ö‡∑Ä‡∑Å‡∑ä‚Äç‡∂∫ form ‡∂ë‡∂ö.

<form style="padding:10px" class="col-sm-8 bg-light mb-3">
    <div class="form-group">
        <label for="exampleInputEmail1">Email address</label>
        <input type="text" v-model="newTitle" class="form-control" placeholder="Message title" required>
    </div>
    <div class="form-group">
        <textarea v-model="newBody" class="form-control" rows="3" placeholder="Message body" required></textarea>
    </div>
    <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Submit</button>
</form>

‡∂∏‡∑ö ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ô ‡∂í¬†form ‡∂ë‡∂ö. ‡∂∏‡∑ö‡∂ö ‡∂∏‡∑ö ‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂Ø‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂ß index.html ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ö enter ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂¥‡∑î‡∑Ö‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∂±‡∑ä.

<div id="my-app">
  <div class="container" style="margin-top:10px">
    <form style="padding:10px" class="col-sm-8 bg-light mb-3">
      <div class="form-group">
        <label for="exampleInputEmail1">Email address</label>
        <input type="text" v-model="newTitle" class="form-control" placeholder="Message title" required>
      </div>
      <div class="form-group">
        <textarea v-model="newBody" class="form-control" rows="3" placeholder="Message body" required></textarea>
      </div>
      <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Submit</button>
    </form>

    <h1>Recent Messages</h1>
    <blog-message v-for="message in messages" :title="message.title" :body="message.body"></blog-message>
  </div>
</div>

‡∂∏‡∑ö form ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ö ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂± message title ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∑É‡∑Ñ message body ‡∂ë‡∂ö store ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂ú‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±,¬†newTitle,¬†newBody ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂Ω¬†data 2‡∂ö‡∑ä define ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂ú‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂¥‡∑î‡∑Ö‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∂±‡∑ä. v-model directive ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∂∑‡∑è‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂≠‡∑è ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂Ω, form ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ö¬†title ‡∑É‡∑Ñ¬†body ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂± text field ‡∂Ø‡∑ô‡∂ö‡∂ß,¬†¬†‡∂í data 2 bind ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂Ω‡∂∫‡∑í ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ô.

data: {
    newTitle: '',
    newBody: '',
    messages: []
}

‡∑Ñ‡∂ª‡∑í ‡∂Ø‡∑ê‡∂±‡∑ä form ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂≠‡∑ä ‡∑Ñ‡∂ª‡∑í. ‡∂Ø‡∑ê‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ô add button ‡∂ë‡∂ö click ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∑è‡∂∏, post ‡∂ë‡∂ö add ‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂± functionality ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∑Ñ‡∂Ø‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±. ‡∂í‡∂ö‡∂ß ‡∂Ö‡∂Ø‡∑è‡∂Ω code ‡∂ë‡∂ö methods object ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∂á‡∂≠‡∑î‡∂Ω‡∑ô ‡∂Ω‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂¥‡∑î‡∑Ö‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∂±‡∑ä. ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í ‡∂í‡∂ö addPost ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂Ω method ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö ‡∂Ω‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂∏‡∑î. ‡∂¥‡∑ú‡∂©‡∑í ‡∂Ø‡∑ô‡∂∫‡∂∫‡∑í ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ô. newTitle ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∑É‡∑Ñ newBody ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∂Ö‡∂©‡∂Ç‡∂ú‡∑î object ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä messages ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂± array ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ß add ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ô. ‡∂ë‡∂≠‡∂ö‡∑ú‡∂ß message ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂± data ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑É‡∑ä ‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂± ‡∂±‡∑í‡∑É‡∑è, Vue ‡∑Ä‡∂Ω‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä automatically‡∂∏ ‡∂Ü‡∂¥‡∑Ñ‡∑î ‡∂î‡∂ö‡∑ä‡∂ö‡∑ú‡∂∏ messages ‡∂ß‡∑í‡∂ö render ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑Ä. ‡∂∏‡∑ö ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ô ‡∂í‡∂ö‡∂ß ‡∂Ö‡∂Ø‡∑è‡∂Ω code ‡∂ë‡∂ö.

methods: {
    addMessage: function () {
        this.messages.unshift({
             title: this.newTitle,
             body: this.newBody
        })
        this.newTitle = ''
        this.newBody = ''
    }
}

‡∂Ø‡∑ê‡∂±‡∑ä, form ‡∂ë‡∂ö submit ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂Ø‡∑ä‡∂Ø‡∑í ‡∂∏‡∑ö method ‡∂ë‡∂ö call ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∑è‡∂∏ ‡∑Ñ‡∂ª‡∑í. ‡∂í‡∂ö‡∂ß v-on:submit directive ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∂∑‡∑è‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂≠‡∑è ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂ï‡∂±‡∑ô. ‡∑É‡∂∏‡∑ä‡∂¥‡∑ñ‡∂ª‡∑ä‡∂´ code ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‚Å£‡∂¥‡∑Ñ‡∑Ö ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑Ä.

Vue.component('blog-message', {
    props: ['title', 'body'],
    template: `
        <div class="card bg-light mb-3">
            <div class="card-header">{{ title }}</div>
            <div class="card-body">
                <p class="card-text">{{ body }}</p>
            </div>
        </div>
    `,
});

const app = new Vue({
    el: '#my-app',
    data: {
        newTitle: 'Title',
        newBody: 'Message body',
        messages: []
    },

    methods: {
        addMessage: function () {
            this.messages.unshift({ title: this.newTitle, body: this.newBody }) 
            this.newTitle = '' 
            this.newBody = '' 
         }
    }
});

<div id="my-app">

  <div class="container" style="margin-top:10px">
    <form style="padding:10px" class="col-sm-8 bg-light mb-3" @submit.prevent="addMessage()">
      <div class="form-group">
        <label for="exampleInputEmail1">Email address</label>
        <input type="text" v-model="newTitle" class="form-control" placeholder="Message title" required>
      </div>
      <div class="form-group">
        <textarea v-model="newBody" class="form-control" rows="3" placeholder="Message body" required></textarea>
      </div>
      <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Submit</button>
    </form>

    <h1>Recent Messages</h1>
    <blog-message v-for="message in messages" :title="message.title" :body="message.body"></blog-message>
  </div>
</div>

‡∂Ø‡∑ê‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂∂‡∑ú‡∑Ñ‡∑ù ‡∂Ø‡∑î‡∂ª‡∂ß app ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∑Ñ‡∂Ø‡∂Ω ‡∂â‡∑Ä‡∂ª‡∂∫‡∑í. add ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂± Messages, locally store ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂ú‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂Ø‡∑ê‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í‡∂ß ‡∂¥‡∑î‡∑Ö‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ô. ‡∂Ö‡∂Ø‡∂ß ‡∂∏‡∂∏ ‡∂∏‡∑ô‡∂≠‡∂±‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂±‡∑Ä‡∂≠‡∑ä‡∂≠‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∂∏‡∑ä. ‡∂Ø‡∑ê‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂î‡∂∫‡∑è‡∂Ω‡∂ß ‡∂∫‡∂∏‡∑ä ‡∂Ö‡∂Ø‡∑Ñ‡∑É‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂ë‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂á‡∂≠‡∑í, ‡∂ö‡∂Ω‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä post ‡∑Ä‡∂Ω ‡∂∏‡∂∏ ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂¥‡∑î ‡∂Ø‡∑ö‡∑Ä‡∂Ω‡∑ä ‡∂ö‡∑ú‡∑Ñ‡∑ú‡∂∏‡∂Ø ‡∂¥‡∑ä‚Äç‡∂ª‡∑è‡∂∫‡∑ú‡∂ú‡∑í‡∂ö‡∑Ä ‡∂∑‡∑è‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂≠‡∑è ‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ô ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂Ω. ‡∂ä‡∑Ö‡∂ú post ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂∏‡∂∏ ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∂∏‡∑ä database ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö store ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂ª‡∑ì‡∂∏ ‡∑É‡∂Ø‡∑Ñ‡∑è, back-end ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ß ‡∂∏‡∑ö messages ‡∂∫‡∑Ä‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ô ‡∂ö‡∑ú‡∑Ñ‡∑ú‡∂∏‡∂Ø ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂Ω. ‡∑É‡∑Ñ back-end ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂±‡∑ê‡∑Ä‡∂≠ ‡∂í‡∑Ä ‡∂Ö‡∂ª‡∂ú‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ô ‡∂ö‡∑ú‡∑Ñ‡∑ô‡∂∏‡∂Ø ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂Ω.¬†post ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∂ú‡∑ê‡∂± ‡∂Ö‡∂Ø‡∑Ñ‡∑É‡∑ä, ‡∂∫‡∑ù‡∂¢‡∂±‡∑è, ‡∂°‡∑ù‡∂Ø‡∂±‡∑è, ‡∂¥‡∑ä‚Äç‡∂ª‡∑Å‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂∏‡∑ú‡∂±‡∑Ä‡∂∏ ‡∑Ñ‡∂ª‡∑í ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂±‡∂∏‡∑ä comment ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂Ø‡∑è‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±.¬†üòÄ

‡∂ä‡∑Ö‡∂ü post ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ß ‡∂∏‡∑ô‡∂≠‡∂±‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂∫‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±.
